description: FAISS Vector Store with efficient similarity search capabilities for high-dimensional vectors.

index_name.info: Name of the FAISS index file (without extension).

persist_directory.info: Path to save the FAISS index. It will be relative to where Langflow is running. Leave empty to use the current directory.

allow_dangerous_deserialization.info: Set to True to allow loading pickle files from untrusted sources. Only enable this if you trust the source of the data. WARNING: This can execute arbitrary code.

number_of_results.info: Number of similar documents to return from the search.

errors.failed_to_load: Failed to load the FAISS index.

logs.using_current_directory: Using current directory as persist directory
logs.directory_created: Persist directory created or already exists: {path}
logs.index_saved: FAISS index saved to '{path}' with name '{name}'
logs.index_not_found: Index not found at {path}, building new index
logs.no_query: No search query provided, returning empty results
